name: Avoid The Obstacles! (WIP)
description:
Hello and welcome to Avoid The Obstacles!.

ATO is my first game to release, it is currently in demo state and just an idea, hopefully it can evolve into something better, please try it out and tell me below how it was (Negative and Positive).

The goal is ofcouse to complete the level but avoid the obstacles, if you hit any of the obstacles then you will be reset to the level'ed beginning, no checkpoints.

Genre: 3D Platformer

Gameplay: Single Player 

Type: Third person/ball view

Platform: PC 

Status: DEMO v0.1

Game Difficulty: Easy / Normal

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

  • Movement – WASD
  • Pause Menu - ESC

TO-DO-LIST

  1. More options in the main/pause menu.
  2. More Levels.
  3. Save and Load.
